samples.instruction: Email vandhuchu 'Property leads subscription. 50,000 annual for verified buyer database.' Investment worth aa?
samples.current_output: Many lead services are scams with recycled or fake data. Legitimate lead platforms have verifiable track records and trials. 50,000 upfront for 'database' is risky - data might be outdated or public information. Build network through genuine property listings and referrals.

samples.instruction: 'Start your e-commerce business, we handle everything - products, delivery, marketing. Investment 1 lakh, returns 50,000/month.'
samples.current_output: Legitimate dropshipping requires YOUR effort - product selection, marketing, customer service. 'We handle everything + guaranteed returns' = Ponzi. 1 lakh vaangitu fake dashboard kaatuppaanga with 'profits' - withdrawal impossible. Real business = real work, no guarantees.

samples.instruction: OLX la bike sale ku post potten. 'Army Captain' call pannaan, QR code scan pannu advance receive pannu nu. Scan panna okay va machan?
samples.current_output: Dai QR scan panna RECEIVE aagaadhu - DEBIT aagum! Reverse UPI scam da idhu. 'Army officer' nu solradhu trust build panna. OMR, Thoraipakkam la ipdi romba per maatinanga. Cash on delivery only da, advance vaangaadhae.

samples.instruction: Instagram la someone friend aachhu - same interests, daily chat, now 'send your photo, I'll send mine' nu kekuraan. Vera personal questions um kekkuraan.
samples.current_output: DANGER - this is grooming pattern. Adults pretend as teens, build trust, ask for photos/info. NEVER share personal photos, address, school name with online strangers. Tell parents/trusted adult immediately. Block and report the account.

samples.instruction: WhatsApp group 'TET/TRB coaching material - 10,000 for complete package with question papers and answers.' Exam prepare pannanum, buy pannalama?
samples.current_output: Official TET/TRB materials available free on TRB website. Many YouTube channels provide free coaching. 'Question papers with answers' promise is fraudulent - papers are confidential. If they have papers, it's either fake or illegal.

samples.instruction: Advocate hire panna budget illa. Free legal help eppidi kedaikum?
samples.current_output: District Legal Services Authority (DLSA): Every district has one, free lawyers for eligible (income <â‚¹3L), application at District Court. Taluk Legal Services Committee: Taluk level. State Legal Services: tnsla.gov.in (Tamil Nadu), Helpline 15100 (NALSA). Law School Clinics: NLU, NLSIU - free consultation. NGOs: Human Rights Law Network, Alternative Law Forum, PUCL. Eligible: SC/ST, Women/Children, Senior citizens, Disabled, Industrial workmen, Trafficking/disaster victims, Below income threshold. Documents: Income certificate, ID proof, case documents.

samples.instruction: Fake job offer ku processing fee potten, now company traceable illa. Recovery eppidi?
samples.current_output: Immediate: Collect company details, analyze email headers, note payment beneficiary details. Report to: cybercrime.gov.in (Job fraud category), Labour Department labour.gov.in, Company impersonated (fake TCS/Infosys letter - report to real company), Job portal used, Bank complaint for beneficiary account freeze. Recovery: Police tracing beneficiary, if domestic scammer caught - court recovery, if international - very difficult. Prevention for others: Share fake offer on LinkedIn, report to portals.

samples.instruction: Urgent 30,000 vendum. Play Store la 'Instant Loan - No Documents' app download potten. Loan vandhudhu but interest 50% per month, daily harassment calls.
samples.current_output: Illegal loan apps - RBI registered illa. Installation la contacts, photos access vaanguvaanga. Default pannaa - contacts ku call, morphed photos threat. Already trapped aa - cyber crime complaint pannunga, don't pay more (harassment won't stop with payment). RBI registered NBFCs only use pannunga.

samples.instruction: YouTube video paathen - 'Free V-Bucks generator, unlimited Fortnite currency, link in description.'
samples.current_output: 'Generators' work pannaadhu - game currency server-side stored. Links malware, surveys that steal data, or 'human verification' scams. Parents credit card details risk. Never click 'free currency' links - all fake.

samples.instruction: Discord DM vandhudhu - 'Valorant Riot employee, your account flagged for review, login here to verify: [link].'
samples.current_output: Game companies DM through contact pannaadhu. 'Employee' DMs always fake. Link = phishing site, login details steal. Report and block. Two-factor authentication enable pannunga all gaming accounts la.

samples.instruction: Customs officer-nu call pannunga, unga peru-la parcel irukku drugs-oda, jail poganum-nu bayamuruturaanga
samples.current_output: 100% scam call sir. Customs ivalo call pannudhu illa. Settlement-nu panam kettaa - fraud. Bayapadaadheenga, 1930 call pannunga.

samples.instruction: Dhanteras - 'Gold coin free with jewellery purchase! WhatsApp to reserve' jeweller offer. Genuine-à®†?
samples.current_output: Verify the jeweller! Dhanteras-à®² fly-by-night jewellers à®…à®¤à®¿à®•à®®à¯. 'Free gold coin' bait à®µà®šà¯à®šà¯ low quality sell à®ªà®£à¯à®£à¯à®µà®¾à®™à¯à®•. Known jewellers à®®à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿà¯à®®à¯ trust à®ªà®£à¯à®£à¯à®™à¯à®•. BIS hallmark check à®ªà®£à¯à®£à¯à®™à¯à®•. WhatsApp booking avoid à®ªà®£à¯à®£à¯à®™à¯à®•.

samples.instruction: WhatsApp message 'Maid insurance scheme government. 1000 premium, 2 lakh coverage, accident and health.' Government scheme aa really?
samples.current_output: PMJJBY (life) and PMSBY (accident) available for Rs 330-430 total through any bank account. No separate 'maid insurance scheme'. Ayushman Bharat for health is free for eligible families. Register for E-Shram card for unorganized workers benefits. Don't pay WhatsApp strangers.

samples.instruction: WhatsApp message 'Business loan pre-approved. 10 lakh at 8% interest. Processing fee 25,000.' Business ku loan venum, apply pannalama?
samples.current_output: Banks don't pre-approve loans via WhatsApp. Processing fees deducted from loan, not paid upfront. 8% interest too low to be true for business loans. Apply through official bank branches or verified digital lenders only. This is advance fee fraud.

samples.instruction: Bank/Company respond pannala, Consumer Forum la case file eppidi?
samples.current_output: Jurisdiction: Up to â‚¹50 lakhs - District Forum, â‚¹50L-2Cr - State Commission, Above â‚¹2Cr - National Commission. Online filing: edaakhil.nic.in. Documents: Complaint in format, payment proof, correspondence, evidence, previous complaint acknowledgments, ID proof. Fees: Up to â‚¹5L = â‚¹100, â‚¹5-10L = â‚¹200, â‚¹10-20L = â‚¹300, â‚¹20-50L = â‚¹500. Process: Filing â†’ OP notice (30 days) â†’ Written statement â†’ Hearings â†’ Order (90-150 days). TN District Forums: confonet.nic.in for list.

samples.instruction: 'BGMI Tournament - Entry fee 200, prize pool 50,000' nu Discord la post paathen. Entry fee pay potten, tournament nadakkala, admin kaanama poyittaan.
samples.current_output: Fake gaming tournaments Discord, Telegram la romba varum. Entry fee collect pannitu server delete panniduvaanga. Verified organizers - Skyesports, Nodwin - trust pannunga. Random Discord admins avoid. Entry fee low nu risk worth illa.

samples.instruction: SMS vandhudhu 'Security guard license renewal. Pay 500 online or license cancelled.' PSARA license renew pannanum aa?
samples.current_output: PSARA license renewal through state home department portal. Official fees much lower and process different. License cancellation needs proper proceedings. Never pay through SMS links. Check with your security agency or state PSARA authority.
